title: The Sword of Monte Cristo (1951 Adventure) A blade forged in secrets, an Empire Aflame!

sources.title: The Sword of Monte Cristo (1951 Adventure) A blade forged in secrets, an Empire Aflame!
sources.description:
Lady Christianne, the daring Masked Cavalier, races through 1858 France, decoding her uncle’s sword to find a treasure that could fund a rebellion. Tasked with stopping her, Captain Renault becomes captivated by her skill and spirit. Sparks fly, betrayals ignite, and blades clash as they face off against the ruthless Minister La Roche in a battle to rewrite history—or die trying!

Original title: The Sword of Monte Cristo (1951) 

Director: Maurice Geraghty
Writers: Alexandre Dumas, Maurice Geraghty, Edward L. Alperson

Main actors:
George Montgomery - Capt. Renault
Rita Corday - Lady Christianne
William Conrad - Major Spitzer
Berry Kroeger - Lafarge
Steve Brodie - Maximilian
Rhys Williams - Dr. Fontaine

Genres: Adventure, Drama, Literary
Release date: February 21, 1951
Filming location: Los Angeles, California,


@CultCinemaClassics
